name: EXTREME CASHIER
description: The Studio Gamako release another game and the internet goes wild once more. That's no surprise considering the talent of the team behind this EXTREME CASHIER. This new game is an extremely fast paced cashier immersive sim where you must get as much money as possible in a single minute. The studio definitely took inspiration from the From Software games. Indeed the game will ask you to overcome your own limits, finally bringing an intense feeling of accomplishment and satisfaction. The only question now is if EXTREME CASHIER will be the GOTY of 2021.
